languages.text: Медикусы с нижних уровней доложили о появившемся густом фиолетовом тумане, при соприкосновении с которым у людей появляются мутантские уродства — короткие, меньше мизинца, щупальца. Так как уродства не мешают работе, медикусы засомневались, стоит ли беспокоиться по их поводу. Однако по палубам начали разноситься тревожные шепотки: "Ересь!"

traits.locale_text: Медикусы с нижних уровней доложили о появившемся густом фиолетовом тумане, при соприкосновении с которым у людей появляются мутантские уродства — короткие, меньше мизинца, щупальца. Так как уродства не мешают работе, медикусы засомневались, стоит ли беспокоиться по их поводу. Однако по палубам начали разноситься тревожные шепотки: "Ересь!"

languages.text: The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.
languages.original_text: Медикусы с нижних уровней доложили о появившемся густом фиолетовом тумане, при соприкосновении с которым у людей появляются мутантские уродства — короткие, меньше мизинца, щупальца. Так как уродства не мешают работе, медикусы засомневались, стоит ли беспокоиться по их поводу. Однако по палубам начали разноситься тревожные шепотки: "Ересь!"

traits.locale_text: The medicus teams from the lower decks reported a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicuses are not sure whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern but the riff-raff are already whispering of heresy.

The medicus teams from the lower decks reported a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicuses are not sure whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern but the riff-raff are already whispering of heresy.

The medicus teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medici are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riff-raff are already whispering of heresy.

The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.

The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.

languages.text: 来自下层甲板的医疗小组报告说，下层甲板出现了紫色的浓雾。这种浓雾会导致人体发生畸变，长出约莫小指长的触手。由于这些畸变并没有影响到船员的行为表现，因此治疗师无法确定这种现象是否值得关注。不过，船上已经出现了传言，说这是异端的表现。
languages.original_text: The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.

traits.locale_text: 来自下层甲板的医疗小组报告说，下层甲板出现了紫色的浓雾。这种浓雾会导致人体发生畸变，长出约莫小指长的触手。由于这些畸变并没有影响到船员的行为表现，因此治疗师无法确定这种现象是否值得关注。不过，船上已经出现了传言，说这是异端的表现。

languages.text: Los equipos medicae de las cubiertas inferiores informan de la aparición de una densa niebla púrpura que provoca deformidades mutantes en las personas: tentáculos cortos de la longitud aproximada de un dedo meñique. Dado que las deformidades no interfieren en el rendimiento de la tripulación, los medicae no están seguros de si este fenómeno debería ser motivo de preocupación, pero la gente ya está hablando de herejía.
languages.original_text: The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.

traits.locale_text: Los equipos medicae de las cubiertas inferiores informan de la aparición de una densa niebla púrpura que provoca deformidades mutantes en las personas: tentáculos cortos de la longitud aproximada de un dedo meñique. Dado que las deformidades no interfieren en el rendimiento de la tripulación, los medicae no están seguros de si este fenómeno debería ser motivo de preocupación, pero la gente ya está hablando de herejía.

languages.text: 下位デッキのメディケアチームから、濃い紫色の霧が出現して、人々が奇形の変異体を発症しているとの報告があった…小指程度の長さの短い触手が表れるという。この症状はクルーのパフォーマンスを阻害しないので、メディケアはこの現象を懸念材料とするべきか頭を悩ませているが、他の連中はすでに異端だとヒソヒソ話している。
languages.original_text: The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.

traits.locale_text: 下位デッキのメディケアチームから、濃い紫色の霧が出現して、人々が奇形の変異体を発症しているとの報告があった…小指程度の長さの短い触手が表れるという。この症状はクルーのパフォーマンスを阻害しないので、メディケアはこの現象を懸念材料とするべきか頭を悩ませているが、他の連中はすでに異端だとヒソヒソ話している。

languages.text: Les équipes de medicae des ponts inférieurs signalent l'apparition d'un épais brouillard violet provoquant de graves difformités sous la forme de courts tentacules de quelques centimètres de long. Les mutations n'ayant pas l'air d'impacter les performances de l'équipage, la medicae n'est pas certaine que ce phénomène soit une source d'inquiétude, mais la racaille crie déjà à l'hérésie.
languages.original_text: The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.

traits.locale_text: Les équipes de medicae des ponts inférieurs signalent l'apparition d'un épais brouillard violet provoquant de graves difformités sous la forme de courts tentacules de quelques centimètres de long. Les mutations n'ayant pas l'air d'impacter les performances de l'équipage, la medicae n'est pas certaine que ce phénomène soit une source d'inquiétude, mais la racaille crie déjà à l'hérésie.

languages.text: Die Medicae-Teams von den Unterdecks haben vom Erscheinen eines dichten violetten Nebels berichtet, der Mutationen auslöst — kurze Tentakeln etwa in der Länge eines kleinen Fingers. Da die Deformationen sich nicht negativ auf die Leistung der Crew auswirken, sind die Medicae sich nicht sicher, ob dieses Phänomen Grund zur Sorge bietet, doch der Pöbel wispert bereits von Ketzerei.
languages.original_text: The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.

traits.locale_text: Die Medicae-Teams von den Unterdecks haben vom Erscheinen eines dichten violetten Nebels berichtet, der Mutationen auslöst — kurze Tentakeln etwa in der Länge eines kleinen Fingers. Da die Deformationen sich nicht negativ auf die Leistung der Crew auswirken, sind die Medicae sich nicht sicher, ob dieses Phänomen Grund zur Sorge bietet, doch der Pöbel wispert bereits von Ketzerei.

languages.text: Alt güvertelerdeki sıhhiye ekipleri, insanlarda mutasyona bağlı deformasyonlara neden olan, yoğun, mor bir sisin ortaya çıktığını rapor etti. Bu deformasyonlar; serçe parmak uzunluğundaki, kısa dokunaçlar şeklinde görülüyor. Deformasyonlar mürettebatın performansını etkilemediği için sıhhiye ekipleri, bu durumun endişe verici olup olmadığından emin değil. Ayaktakımı ise çoktan kâfirlik diye fısıldamaya başladı.
languages.original_text: The medicae teams from the lower decks reported the appearance of a dense purple fog that causes people to develop mutant deformities — short tentacles roughly the length of a pinkie finger. Since the deformities do not interfere with the crew's performance, the medicae are not certain whether this phenomenon should be a cause for concern, but the riffraff are already whispering of heresy.
